    x = 5;

        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable x at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable x at (R7+04) (no initializer)
        MOVE 5, R0              ; load constant 5
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to x
; If-else statement
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable x
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        CMP R0, R1
        JP_SGT L_SC_TRUE1       ; comparison OP_GT
        MOVE 0, R0              ; comparison result false
        JP L_SC_END1
L_SC_TRUE1
        MOVE 1, R0              ; comparison result true
L_SC_END1
        CMP R0, 0
        JP_EQ L_ELSE1           ; if condition is false
; Compound statement
        MOVE 1, R0              ; load constant 1
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function
        JP L_END1               ; skip else
L_ELSE1                         ; else clause
L_END1                          ; end if-else
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

     7   OP_PRIDRUZI        =

     9   KR_RETURN          return

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        break;
    }
    return 0;
}

                                        <log_i_izraz>
                                            <bin_ili_izraz>

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    {
        int x;
        x = 5;
    }
    x = 10;
    return x;
}

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable x at (R7+04)
; Local variable x at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable x at (R7+04) (no initializer)
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable x at (R7+04) (no initializer)
        MOVE 5, R0              ; load constant 5
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to x
        MOVE 10, R0             ; load constant 10
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to x
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable x
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

    int x;
    x = 5;
    x = x + "text";
    return x;
}

int main(void) {
    int x;

    f = 3.14;
    x = f + "text";
    return x;

Lexer: OK Parser: OK Semantic error at line 2 CodeGen: Skipped (semantic failed)
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    }
    return 0;
}

int main(void) {

     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;

     9   BROJ               5
     10   OP_DEC             --
     11   MINUS              -
     12   KR_RETURN          return
     13   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }

int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        int y;
        y = 10;
    }
    y = 20;
    return y;
}

program34.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK Semantic error at line 7 CodeGen: Skipped (semantic failed)
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    for (x = 0; x < 10; x = x + 1) {
        int y;
        y = 5;
    }
    y = 10;
    return y;
}

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
    return 2;
}

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable x at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable x at (R7+04) (no initializer)
        MOVE 5, R0              ; load constant 5
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to x
; If-else statement
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable x
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        CMP R0, R1
        JP_SGT L_SC_TRUE1       ; comparison OP_GT
        MOVE 0, R0              ; comparison result false
        JP L_SC_END1
L_SC_TRUE1
        MOVE 1, R0              ; comparison result true
L_SC_END1
        CMP R0, 0
        JP_EQ L_ELSE1           ; if condition is false
; Compound statement
        MOVE 1, R0              ; load constant 1
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function
        JP L_END1               ; skip else
L_ELSE1                         ; else clause
; Compound statement
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function
L_END1                          ; end if-else
        MOVE 2, R0              ; load constant 2
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
    int y;
    y = 10;
    return y;
}

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable arr at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable arr at (R7+04) (no initializer)
        MOVE 5, R0              ; load constant 5
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to arr
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

program43.c

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
    int y;
    y = 10;
    return y;
}
Lexical Tokens

indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst

     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_GT              >
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_RETURN          return
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   KR_ELSE            else
     17   IDN                y
     18   BROJ               10

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
    int y;
    y = 10;
    return y;
}

<prijevodna_jedinica>
    <vanjska_deklaracija>
        <definicija_funkcije>
            <specifikatori_deklaracije>
                <specifikator_tipa>
                    KR_INT , int
            <deklarator>
                <izravni_deklarator>
                    <izravni_deklarator>
                        IDN , main
                    L_ZAGRADA , (
                    <lista_parametara>
                        <deklaracija_parametra>
                            <specifikatori_deklaracije>
                                <specifikator_tipa>
                                    KR_VOID , void
                    D_ZAGRADA , )
            <slozena_naredba>
                L_VIT_ZAGRADA , {
                <lista_deklaracija>

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable i at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable i at (R7+04) (no initializer)
; For loop with increment
L_LOOP1                         ; for loop start
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 10, R0             ; load constant 10
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        CMP R0, R1
        JP_SLT L_SC_TRUE1       ; comparison OP_LT
        MOVE 0, R0              ; comparison result false
        JP L_SC_END1
L_SC_TRUE1
        MOVE 1, R0              ; comparison result true
L_SC_END1
        CMP R0, 0
        JP_EQ L_BREAK1          ; exit for loop
; Compound statement
L_CONTINUE1                     ; for loop increment
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 1, R0              ; load constant 1
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        ADD R0, R1, R0          ; addition
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to i
        JP L_LOOP1              ; repeat for loop
L_BREAK1                        ; for loop end
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

program65.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK Semantic: OK CodeGen: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; ; i = i + 1) {
        if (i > 10) {
            break;
        }
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   KR_FOR             for
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   PLUS               +
     12   BROJ               1
     13   KR_IF              if
     14   OP_GT              >
     15   BROJ               10
     16   KR_BREAK           break
     17   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     18   KR_RETURN          return

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable i at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable i at (R7+04) (no initializer)
; For loop with increment
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to i
L_LOOP1                         ; for loop start
; Compound statement
; If statement
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 10, R0             ; load constant 10
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        CMP R0, R1
        JP_SGT L_SC_TRUE1       ; comparison OP_GT
        MOVE 0, R0              ; comparison result false
        JP L_SC_END1
L_SC_TRUE1
        MOVE 1, R0              ; comparison result true
L_SC_END1
        CMP R0, 0
        JP_EQ L_END1            ; if condition is false
; Compound statement
        JP L_BREAK1             ; break from loop
L_END1                          ; end if
L_CONTINUE1                     ; for loop increment
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 1, R0              ; load constant 1
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        ADD R0, R1, R0          ; addition
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to i
        JP L_LOOP1              ; repeat for loop
L_BREAK1                        ; for loop end
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

program66.c

Lexer: OK Parser: OK Semantic: OK CodeGen: OK
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 10;) {
        i = i + 1;
    }
    return i;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                i
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   KR_FOR             for
     9   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     10   BROJ               0
     11   OP_LT              <
     12   BROJ               10
     13   PLUS               +
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   KR_RETURN          return

    <vanjska_deklaracija>

            <specifikatori_deklaracije>

Generated FRISC Assembly Code 
; Program entry point
        MOVE 40000, R7          ; init stack pointer
        CALL F_MAIN             ; call main
        HALT                    ; end of program, R6 holds return value

; Function definitions
F_MAIN                          ; Function main
; Local variable i at (R7+04)
        SUB R7, 04, R7          ; allocate 1 local variables
; Compound statement
; Local variable declarations
; Local variable i at (R7+04) (no initializer)
        MOVE 0, R0              ; load constant 0
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to i
L_LOOP1                         ; for loop
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 10, R0             ; load constant 10
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        CMP R0, R1
        JP_SLT L_SC_TRUE1       ; comparison OP_LT
        MOVE 0, R0              ; comparison result false
        JP L_SC_END1
L_SC_TRUE1
        MOVE 1, R0              ; comparison result true
L_SC_END1
        CMP R0, 0
        JP_EQ L_BREAK1          ; exit for loop
; Compound statement
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        PUSH R0                 ; save left operand
        MOVE 1, R0              ; load constant 1
        MOVE R0, R1             ; right operand to R1
        POP R0                  ; restore left operand
        ADD R0, R1, R0          ; addition
        STORE R0, (R7+04)       ; assign to i
        JP L_LOOP1              ; repeat for loop
L_BREAK1
        LOAD R0, (R7+04)        ; load variable i
        MOVE R0, R6             ; return value
        ADD R7, 04, R7          ; deallocate local variables
        RET                     ; return from function

; Global variables

program67.c

Lexer: OK Parser error at line 9 Semantic: Skipped (parser failed) CodeGen: Skipped (semantic failed)
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int x;
    x = 5;
    if (x > 0) {
        return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
    int y;
    y = 10;
    return y;
}
Lexical Tokens 
tablica znakova:
indeks   uniformni znak   izvorni tekst
     0   KR_INT             int
     1   IDN                main
     2   L_ZAGRADA          (
     3   KR_VOID            void
     4   D_ZAGRADA          )
     5   L_VIT_ZAGRADA      {
     6   IDN                x
     7   TOCKAZAREZ         ;
     8   OP_PRIDRUZI        =
     9   BROJ               5
     10   KR_IF              if
     11   OP_GT              >
     12   BROJ               0
     13   KR_RETURN          return
     14   BROJ               1
     15   D_VIT_ZAGRADA      }
     16   KR_ELSE            else
     17   IDN                y
     18   BROJ               10

niz uniformnih znakova:
uniformni znak    redak    indeks u tablicu znakova

IDN                    1       1
L_ZAGRADA              1       2

D_ZAGRADA              1       4
L_VIT_ZAGRADA          1       5

IDN                    2       6

    int 7value;

        return 1;

    return 0;
}

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int array[2];
    int *a;
    int *b;
    a = array;
    b = array + 1;
    a = a + b;
    return *a;
}

    float value;
    int *pointer;

    for (i = 0; i < 10; i = i + 1 {
    }
    return i;

Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int buffer[4];
    int *first;
    int *second;
    int *result;
    first = buffer;
    second = buffer + 2;
    result = second - first;
    return *result;
}

                                                                                                IDN , first
                                TOCKAZAREZ , ;
                    <naredba>
                        <naredba_skoka>
                            KR_RETURN , return
                            <izraz>
                                <izraz_pridruzivanja>
                                    <log_ili_izraz>
                                        <log_i_izraz>
                                            <bin_ili_izraz>
                                                <bin_xili_izraz>
                                                    <bin_i_izraz>
                                                        <jednakosni_izraz>
                                                            <odnosni_izraz>
                                                                <aditivni_izraz>
                                                                    <multiplikativni_izraz>
                                                                        <cast_izraz>
                                                                            <unarni_izraz>

                D_VIT_ZAGRADA , }

struct Item {
    int value;
};

int main(void) {
    struct Item item;
    int *pointer;
    item.value = 4;
    pointer = &item;
    return *pointer;
}

                                                                                        <postfiks_izraz>
                                                                                            <primarni_izraz>
                                                                                                IDN , pointer
                            TOCKAZAREZ , ;
                D_VIT_ZAGRADA , }

SEMANTIC ERRORS:

Lexer: OK Parser: OK Semantic error CodeGen: Skipped (semantic failed)
Source Code 
int main(void) {
    int value;
    int *pointer;
    value = 3;
    pointer = &value;
    pointer = pointer * 2;
    return *pointer;
}

Source Code 
int read_value(int *ptr) {
    return *ptr;
}

int main(void) {
    int number;
    number = 6;
    return read_value(number);
}
